videoSnippet.title: The Iron Idiot | A Forced Mate in 10
videoSnippet.description:

David Bronstein vs M20 (Computer)
"The Iron Idiot" (game of the day Apr-13-2016)
Moscu Mathematics Institute (1963), ?, Apr-04 
King's Gambit: Accepted. Schallop Defense (C34)

1. e4 e5 2. f4 ef4 3. Nf3 Nf6 4. e5 Ng4 5. d4 g5 6. Nc3 Ne3 7. Qe2 Nf1 8. Ne4 Ne3 9. Nf6 Ke7 10. Bd2 Nc2 11. Kf2 Na1 12. Nd5 Ke6 13. Qc4 b5 14. Ng5 Qg5 15. Nc7 Ke7 16. Nd5 Ke6 17. Nf4 Ke7 18. Nd5 Ke8 19. Qc8 Qd8 20. Nc7 Ke7 21. Bb4 d6 22. Bd6 Qd6 23. Qe8#

judgment.name: Blunder
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. d6 was best.
